query: SELECT MIN(file_size) as min_size, MAX(file_size) as max_size, AVG(file_size) as avg_size, COUNT(*) as total_files, SUM(CASE WHEN file_size IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as null_count FROM files LIMIT 10;
